text:
King Paul Akpan Udoh (born 5 September 1997) is an Italian footballer. He plays as a forward for Pianese.
Udoh was born in Reggio Emilia and comes from a Nigerian background. He played youth football for Reggiana before signing for Juventus. He was loaned to many clubs while at Juventus, and signed for Viareggio 2014 in 2018. On 14 July 2019, he signed with Pianese.
In February 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, it was made clear that Udoh had tested positive to COVID-19.
